channel.title: What do i need to make a server
channel.description: i got pimpscape i got the server thing for pimpscape what else do i need for other people?

item.title: What do i need to make a server
item.dc:creator: @redfrodude27 redfrodude27
item.description:
@redfrodude27 wrote:

U need to edit ur compiler and runserver:
Compiler-right click, edit, delete all than replace with:

:: ::
:: This Compiler is under no licenses and may ::
:: be distributed freely. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
[/code]
runserver-right click, edit, delete all and replace with:

code@echo off
title Runserver
set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk?.?.???\bin\java.exe"
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause[/code]
Replace the ?.?.??? with ur jdk type
(search JDK on your computer to find out if u dont know)

Read full topic
item.source: What do i need to make a server
